content: the skipped garter ridges charts next row rs k2 * k1 yo k1 into 1 st k1 repeat from * if you wish to make an even larger shawl or make your until the last 3 sts k1 yo k1 into next st k2 35 sts the own mods you will need to increase the stocking stitch k1 yo k1 sequence is worked into the yo s of the section while continuing to work the edge increases to fit previous row chart a your stitch count needs to be a multiple of 17 plus 7 6 stitches for the edges and 1 for the single stitch in very next row ws k2 yo purl to last 2 sts yo k2 37 sts first row outside the repeat box of chart a you could work end of garter tab setup a third row of lifted increases ensuring that your stitch count before you start chart a is a multiple of 17 plus 7 row 1 rs k2 k1 yo k1 into one stitch k to last 3 stitches k1 yo k1 into one stitch k2 41 sts work the charts as follows row 2 ws k2 yo purl to last 2 sts yo k2 43 sts chart a row 3-10 repeat row 1 and 2 until 8 more row have row 1 rs k2 k1 yo k1 into 1 st work row 1 from right been completed 67 sts to left working outlined repeat section 12 times then work 1st lifted increase row to end of chart k1 yo k1 into 1 st k2 row 11 rs k2 k1 yo k1 into one stitch k2 *work lifted row 2 ws k2 yo purl to last 2 sts yo k2 increase k3 repeat from * eighteen times until 5 sts work row 1 to 16 259 sts 293 remain work lifted increase k2 k1 yo k1 into one stitch k2 20 extra increases 91 sts chart b note after working the lifted increase the very next st on row 17 rs k2 k1 yo k1 into 1 st work row 17 from the left hand needle is included in the k3 above right to left working outlined repeat section 14 times then work to end of chart k1 yo k1 into 1 st k2 biophilia copyright © mary-anne mace 2015 this pattern is for personal use only do not sts yo k2 row 2 ws and **all ws row k2 yo purl to last 2 sts yo k2 **except when a double yarn over or quadruple yarn work row 17 to 34 313 sts 347 over are encountered for a double yo knit the first loop chart c and purl the second for a quadruple yo work the loops in the following order k p k p 2 extra
